comments.content:
**[Schmutz ICG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824185111/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/schmutz/)** by Image Club Graphics [1996] which simulates an old typewriter.  
"BROKEN" is probably set in **Schmutz Cleaned** while "FLOWERS" looks like a combination of Cleaned and **Schmutz Corroded**
